Uses of Class
org.apache.juneau.commons.settings.Setting

Packages that use Setting
Package
Description
org.apache.juneau.commons.settings
Thread-safe system property access with support for global and per-thread overrides, making it useful for unit tests and configuration management.

  • Uses of Setting in org.apache.juneau.commons.settings

    Subclasses of Setting in org.apache.juneau.commons.settings
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    StringSetting
    A specialized Setting for string values that provides convenience methods for type conversion.
    Methods in org.apache.juneau.commons.settings that return Setting
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Setting<Boolean>
    StringSetting.asBoolean()
    Converts the string value to a Boolean.
    Setting<Charset>
    StringSetting.asCharset()
    Converts the string value to a Charset.
    Setting<Double>
    StringSetting.asDouble()
    Converts the string value to a Double.
    Setting<File>
    StringSetting.asFile()
    Converts the string value to a File.
    Setting<Float>
    StringSetting.asFloat()
    Converts the string value to a Float.
    Setting<Integer>
    StringSetting.asInteger()
    Converts the string value to an Integer.
    Setting<Long>
    StringSetting.asLong()
    Converts the string value to a Long.
    Setting<Path>
    StringSetting.asPath()
    Converts the string value to a Path.
    <T> Setting<T>
    StringSetting.asType(Class<T> c)
    Converts the string value to the specified type using the Settings type conversion functions.
    Setting<URI>
    StringSetting.asURI()
    Converts the string value to a URI.
    Setting<T>
    Setting.filter(Predicate<? super T> predicate)
    If a value is present, and the value matches the given predicate, returns a Setting describing the value, otherwise returns an empty Setting.
    <U> Setting<U>
    Setting.map(Function<? super T,? extends U> mapper)
    If a value is present, applies the provided mapping function to it and returns a Setting describing the result.
